description: Celtic Midori is another Megeran operator who has all sorts of costumes. She`s mostly a cosplay person of the crew. She wears a full body teddy bear costume as a way to conceal her body from the men onboard and later is one the leaders who imprison Hibiki, Duelo, and Bart. She comes around as the male and female relations improve by cutting the face out of her teddy bear costume.
name: Celtic Midori
